caption.p: Epidemiological data of dengue outbreaks in Guangdong since 2005 and sample information collected in 2014. ( A) The number of reported cases from Guangdong and the four major centers of epidemics as of November 4, 2018. ( B) Time distribution of samples collected in 2014. ( C) Percentage of indigenous and imported cases reported annually. ( D) Identification of dengue virus serotypes annually. ( E) Regional distribution of samples collected in 2014. This figure appears in color at www.ajtmh.org.
